Class RetryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.syncengine.RetryStrategy

  • public final class RetryStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines inner classes and interfaces related to retry strategies.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.amplifyframework.datastore.syncengine.RetryStrategy.RxRetryStrategy RX_INTERRUPTIBLE_WITH_BACKOFF
      Simple defaults strategy that allows interruptions and has a max delay of 2^8.
